summary: CONSUMER CALLED COMPLAINING ABOUT THE ENGINE. ALSO STATED THAT WHILE THE VEHICLE IS ON NEUTRAL OR PARK THE ENGINE WILL ACCELERATE ON ITS OWN WITH OUT THE CONSUMER STEEPING ON THE GAS PEDAL. DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND HAS NOT BE ABLE TO FIND THE PROBLEM CONSUMER HAS NOT HEARD FROM THEM AND THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN AT THE SHOP FOR A WEEK. TS
